DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety tolerability PF-04995274 administration single dose healthy volunteer , evaluate plasma drug concentration single dose healthy volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Evaluate The Safety , Tolerability And Plasma Drug Levels Following A Single Dose Of PF-04995274 In Healthy Adult Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose evaluate safety pharmacokinetics single dose PF-04995274 healthy adult volunteer .
DOC.criteria: For cohort , healthy male and/or female subject nonchildbearing potential age 18 55 year , inclusive . ( Healthy define clinically relevant abnormality identify detailed medical history , full physical examination , include blood pressure heart rate measurement , 12 lead ECG clinical laboratory test ) . Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease ( include drug allergy , exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose ) . Pregnant nursing woman ; woman childbearing potential . Female subject must non childbearing potential defined history surgical sterilization ( eg , hysterectomy bilateral oophorectomy ) post menopausal status ( complete absence menses least two consecutive year ) elevate FSH concentration woman 45 55 .
